description: "Map of the coast of Selangor on the west of the Malay Peninsula. The web of lines is a rhumbline network, the numbers indicate sea depth (bathymetry), and there are drawings of the side views of mountains (elevations), all to aid navigation."
title: "Plan de Salangor et de La Cote de Malaye : depuis la Pointe de Caran jusqu'au Mont Parcelar"
